paragraph:
All news in one place, be the
first to know last news
signUpParagraph:
Hello, I guess you are new around here. You
can start using the application after sign up.
loginParagraph:
I am happy to see you again. You can 
ncontinue where you left off by logging in
youHaventSavedAnyArticles: You haven't saved any articles yet. Start reading and bookmarking them now
forgetParagraph: We need your email adress so we can send you the password reset code.

selectYourFavouriteTopicsParagraph:
Select some of your favorite topics to let us
suggest better news for you.
verificationCodeParagraph:
You need to enter 4-digit code we send to

categoriesParagraph: Thousands of articles in each category
